name: Russian Offroad 3D
description:
Did you ever want to be in the most impassable place? Where any SUV is stuck? Try to overcome the track full of mud and stones with the help of Russian cars!
You can use popular cars, as well as SUVs. Collect points and get new cars. Choose different routes and start the off-road trip. You can choose, for example, UAZ or VAZ to overcome deep mud puddles.

Russian Offroad 3D game features:
- Beautiful graphics
- Difficult off-road race
- Many barriers
- Various cars
- Easy car control

The dirtiest roads in Russia are waiting for you!
